content:
Eminem Oprah and Queen Elizabeth II were all a part of Wednesdays One Mic Stand Comedy show PERIOD

Comedian Tracey Ashley performed as part of the spring comedy series hosted by EXCEL Campus Activities every semester.jathumbnail off

Ashley used pop culture and history to talk about subjects like gay marriages and slavery PERIOD

She shared with the crowds different scenarios of current public figures and past history PERIOD

Can you imagine Oprah and the underground railroad she asked the audience PERIOD If you look under your chairs  freedom

Ashley said she likes making people laugh but there has to be a point with her jokes PERIOD

She said the angle in her jokes is to be insightful PERIOD

Ashley likes to talk about everything but sex is a topic that usually doesnt show up in her material she said PERIOD

I dont know why Ashley said about her reasoning PERIOD

She said its something she might try later but she hasnt found the funny angle to sex yet PERIOD

I can enjoy some good raunchy comedy.. PERIOD if youre funny Ashley said PERIOD If youre just up there talking raunch and theres no punch line I dont have time for that. after receiving a text message from her friend public relations freshman Eliana Sillas decided to go to the show at the last minute PERIOD

I figured it would be a good stress reliever because I had just gotten out of a horrible test Sillas said PERIOD

This was Sillas first comedy show on campus and she said she has never heard of Ashley PERIOD

I figured Oh its just some random person trying to make it big Sillas said PERIOD Im really glad I came because her jokes were really unique and hilarious. the comedian said she enjoys the college atmosphere and trusts students reactions more than a comedy club audience PERIOD

I like the clubs too clubs are great but you know people are drinking she said PERIOD Its a different environment and so my act is different PERIOD For colleges I mean you guys are sober you know So if youre laughing that means it really is funny. while holding three cans of Pepsi broadcast communication sophomore Virginia Villatoro said she loves coming to the comedy shows on campus PERIOD

I have all these free Pepsi cans I get free stuff its awesome Villatoro said PERIOD

Villatoro said she has tried telling jokes but it hasnt been a success PERIOD

One Mic Stand has joke competitions for students in the beginning of each show to test their comedy skills PERIOD

I did do it the first time but people booed me Villatoro said PERIOD
